price: 56. Zij zullen daar nooit de dood proeven, behalve de eerste dood, en Hij zal hen van de bestraffing van het laaiende vuur redden.
arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā al-mawta illā al-mawtata al-ūlā wawaqāhum ʿadhāba al-jaḥīmi
